org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.linux.resources

类 CGroupsMemoryResourceHandlerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.linux.resources.CGroupsMemoryResourceHandlerImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MemoryResourceHandler, ResourceHandler

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
 @InterfaceStability.Unstable
public class CGroupsMemoryResourceHandlerImpl
extends Object
implements MemoryResourceHandler
    Handler class to handle the memory controller. YARN already ships a physical memory monitor in Java but it isn't as good as CGroups. This handler sets the soft and hard memory limits. The soft limit is set to 90% of the hard limit.

      • preStart

        public List<PrivilegedOperation> preStart(Container container)
                                   throws ResourceHandlerException
        从接口复制的说明: ResourceHandler
        Prepare a resource environment for container launch
        指定者:
        preStart 在接口中 ResourceHandler
        参数:
        container - Container being launched
        返回:
        (possibly empty) list of operations that require elevated privileges e.g a) create a custom cgroup b) add pid for container to tasks file for a cgroup.
        抛出:
        ResourceHandlerException

        public List<PrivilegedOperation> teardown()
                                   throws ResourceHandlerException
        从接口复制的说明: ResourceHandler
        Teardown environment for resource subsystem if requested. This method needs to be used with care since it could impact running containers.
        指定者:
        teardown 在接口中 ResourceHandler
        返回:
        (possibly empty) list of operations that require elevated privileges
        抛出:
